Name: CGI™: The Game
About the game: The world's first open-world action game from creative house CGI™️! Step into the shoes of one of 7 real-life body scans of models from today's generation and take on robots aliens & monsters in this futuristic metaverse. Utilizing stunning computer-generated imagery plus a custom soundtrack, the CGI ™️ game offers an immersive and action-packed gaming experience. Access exclusive videos and dive into a world unlike any other. Download CGI™️ now and join the fight for survival and style in this groundbreaking new game A GAME BY HAPPENED OVER TIME PROGRAMMED AND DEVELOPED BY DANTE HOLLEY DEVELPOMENT TEAM VARUN SAI SASAPU KIM HYOUNG JO CHARAN VENDRA CREATIVE DIRECTION DANTE HOLLEY ANTHONY WYLLIE SOUND DESIGN ANTHONY WYLLIE DANTE HOLLEY CUTSCENCES VARUN SAI SASAPU RIGGING KIM HYOUNG JO COVER ARTWORK SALVADOR IGLESIAS TITLE FX IAN LAWRENCE INTRO ANIMATION BUCKETBOI CHARACTER BODY SCANS IVAN BALLEN OF NYCAP3D ENVIRONMENT DANTE HOLLEY ANTHONY WYLLIE DOMES GABRIELA TRUEBA MOBILE BUILD VARUN SAI SASAPU DIGITAL CLOTHING MUSTAFA KORKUT GAME TRAILER DANTE HOLLEY THANKS 4 NOTHING
